  • Constructor Details

    • IntTriangular

      public IntTriangular​(Panel panel, java.lang.String name, int length, int width, int depth, sim.util.gui.ColorMap map, java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double bounds)
      Creates an IntTriangular agent drawer.

      Length and width of the drawer are expanded from the given length and width of the simulation so each index can be drawn as a 3x3 triangle.

      Parameters:
      panel - the panel the drawer is attached to
      name - the name of the drawer
      length - the length of array (x direction)
      width - the width of array (y direction)
      depth - the depth of array (z direction)
      map - the color map for the array
      bounds - the size of the drawer within the panel

  • Method Details

    • step

      public void step​(sim.engine.SimState state)
      Steps the drawer to populate triangular array with double values.
